body:
Comment 1: 
The first problem is a legitimate bug. I suspect some templates might just need updating.

The concern about tip.golang.org is understood, but it will go away with the next
weekly. tip.golang.org runs on a build of godoc from the latest weekly, but with the tip
data files, so there's usually some kind of shear.
_Labels changed: added **priority-go1**, **documentation**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Owner changed to @adg._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
